journey.title: Our Journey
journey.description: Founded in 2004, Sahu Metals has grown from a small workshop to a leading manufacturer of agricultural equipment in India. Our journey has been driven by a deep commitment to supporting Indian farmers with reliable and efficient farming solutions.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower Indian farmers with high-quality, affordable agricultural equipment that enhances productivity and reduces manual labor. We believe in sustainable farming practices and continuously innovate to meet the evolving needs of modern agriculture.
